name: IMPETU
description:
Ímpetu is a spanish word for Momentum.


Ímpetu is also a Retro styled game that combines … the ideas of its creator of what an easy to make driving game is, with some crazy ideas that came along the way.

It's a (not to this moment optimized) breakneck pace curve-fest with awesome creative commons music.

It's also a multi platform experience, if you are into that kind of thing.

What do i mean by that.

Well... Ímpetu is a game that comes along with you.

As long as the place you are going is a PC, Web browser , or android Device.

Which through a High tech multi-platform progress transfer system lets you resume your play session wherever you are (see clarification above, also please note the undetectable joking and non legally binding tone)

And that might be it . I hope you enjoy it, and forgive its shortcomings.
